cast.overview: In the late 1990s, the arrival of elderly invalid Patrick into Marion and Tom’s home triggers the exploration of seismic events from 40 years previous: the passionate relationship between Tom and Patrick at a time when homosexuality was illegal.
cast.title: My Policeman

details.biography: Brian Martin is a multi-talented performer, teaching artist, and creative based in New York City. His passion and joy for Musical Theatre shine through in every aspect of his work. Originally hailing from Grand Rapids, MI, Brian honed his skills and love for the stage, earning a BFA in Music Theatre Performance from Western Michigan University and studying Shakespeare at the prestigious Royal Academy of Dramatic Arts in London.
details.name: Brian Martin
